Game: Zoo Quest- Puzzle Fun! Australia Zoo: Zoo Quest - Puzzle Fun is a Bejeweled-style game where you have to line up different icons in order to score points. The game has multiple game modes and levels of difficulty. For each level that you complete you "save" a new animal of which you get a picture and some information. Highscores from the iPhone version can also be uploaded to the Online Ranking System. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/8b710ccd-2add-4a82-9252-2cd4233cd233.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/6072c101-20f7-41df-9f15-16602acb764c.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/61992d91-5d59-4e46-9cd9-ebb650d7dbc2.png
